name: client-ts
description: Common dev-time dependencies for SignalR NPM packages. NOT FOR PUBLISHING

scripts.build: npm run --prefix ./signalr-client build && npm run --prefix ./signalr-protocol-msgpack build && npm run --prefix ./FunctionalTests build
scripts.test: npm run --prefix ./signalr-client test && npm run --prefix ./signalr-protocol-msgpack test && npm run --prefix ./FunctionalTests test
